content: Efficiency. Intelligence seeks efficient use of resources. Energy, time and space are all scarce, fundamental resources.But they aren’t always necessarily spent intelligently. The sun, for example, shines in all directions; it is indiscriminate.What distinguishes human effort is that it is applied sparingly.We know that it is scarce and valuable.So we focus it. Efficiency is possible and desirable. The more efficiently we can gather, store and use resources, The more we can have. Intelligence seeks efficient use of resources.
